      private static void appendHit2Update(final Player p, final PacketBuilder updateBlock) { updateBlock.put((byte) p.getDamage().getHitDamage2()); updateBlock.putByteS((byte) p.getDamage().getHitType2()); updateBlock.put((byte) p.getSkills().getLevel(3)); updateBlock.putByteC(p.getSkills().getLevelForExperience(3)); } private static void appendHitUpdate(final Player p, final PacketBuilder updateBlock) { updateBlock.put((byte) p.getDamage().getHitDamage1()); updateBlock.putByteA(p.getDamage().getHitType1()); updateBlock.putByteC(p.getSkills().getLevel(3)); updateBlock.put((byte) p.getSkills().getLevelForExperience(3)); }
